original_text: But if any of the meat from the offerings remains until the morning, you must burn it. Also burn any bread that remains. You must not eat it, because it is holy.
korean_text: 위임식 고기나 떡이 아침까지 남아 있으면 그것을 불에 사를지니 이는 거룩한즉 먹지 못할지니라

sentences.original_text: But if any of the meat from the offerings remains until the morning
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 제물의 고기 중 아무것이 아침까지 남아 있다면

sentences.original_text: Also burn any bread that remains
